version: '1.1'
condition: yes    # a condition
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:
    description: a leader
    multi: true
  follower:
    description: a follower
    disabled:
      jinja: |
        {% if __.condition == "yes" %}
        disabled
        {% endif %}
      description: if condition is yes
----
